subject: SImsonn X Plus Connection Problem
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Support Team,

I am writing to you regarding a connection problem with my pedals (Simsonn
Plus X + VAM Motor).

The pedals are not displayed in the Simsonn Manager application
altough they did for a short time when I first connected them. They are
connected to the PC via a USB extension cable and installed on a GT Omega
ART cockpit.

Could you please let me know what steps I can take to troubleshoot the
problem or offer me a solution to this connection issue?

Thank you very much for your help.

Kind regards,

Felix

conversations.body_text: Hi HueFelix,    You can download the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 using the link below. Then, follow the steps below to enter the firmware update process:    Press and hold the upgrade button on the PlusX controller box, then reconnect the USB. The software will enter SIMSONN Flasher Mode;    Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu to start the firmware update;    After the firmware update is completed, release the upgrade button;    Finally, test the pedal and perform a calibration.
